title: Associate Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for
 **Associate Software Engineers** 
**!**
**Salary** 
 : INR 28,00,000 \\- 32,00,000 / year
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Test Design \\& Execution: Design, develop, and execute test plans to validate SONiC functionality on Broadcom\\-based switching platforms.
* Automation: Automate functional, regression, scale, and performance test cases using Python and Robot Framework.
* Debugging \\& Analysis: Perform deep\\-dive debugging across ASIC, NOS, and control/data plane layers.
* Open Source Contribution: Collaborate with the SONiC community to contribute fixes, enhancements, and upstream improvements.
* Optical Module Testing: Validate optical modules across speeds, breakout configurations, and transceiver management protocols (e.g., CMIS, DOM).
* Tools \\& Environment: Utilize Git, Jenkins, Docker, and lab\\-based testbed environments for continuous integration and validation.


**Eligibility**
* This is an entry\\-level job
* Proficiency in Python and automation frameworks such as Robot Framework.


 (\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Scoutit's clients)
   

  

 Skills: python,data structures,computer science

title: DevElopEr Intern
description:
**Company Description**

 ZenzHub is a platform for innovative thinkers, builders, and creators who seek to challenge existing systems and design better solutions. It connects a diverse community of students, developers, marketers, operators, and founders passionate about automation, system thinking, and meaningful outcomes. ZenzHub emphasizes creativity, collaboration, and sharing ideas openly to foster growth and build impactful tools and workflows. The platform encourages individuals to learn, build, and deliver actual results while making a difference through innovation and bold ideas.
   




**Role Description**

 The Developer role at ZenzHub is an internship position with the opportunity to work remotely. As a Developer, you will contribute to designing, building, and optimizing innovative tools, systems, or applications. Core responsibilities include writing clean, reusable code, troubleshooting issues, collaborating with the team to develop creative projects, and participating in the ideation and implementation of workflow automations. This role offers valuable hands\\-on experience in developing efficient solutions for real\\-world challenges.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or similar
* Knowledge of systems design, software development best practices, and API integration
* Experience or interest in automation, workflow optimization, and problem\\-solving
* Familiarity with debugging, version control systems (e.g., Git), and testing tools
* Strong collaboration, communication, and teamwork skills in a remote environment
* Desire to innovate, learn, and build impactful solutions
* Previous project experience is a plus but not mandatory

title: Staff Software Engineer (Coimbatore)
description:
Coimbatore office posting only
 



  





 Join our dynamic team at the forefront of cutting\\-edge technology as we seek a seasoned Staff/Lead Backend Engineer. Embark on a journey where your deep\\-rooted expertise in computer science fundamentals, alongside an intricate understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design, becomes the cornerstone of innovative solutions. This pivotal role not only demands your proficiency in developing and elevating compute and I/O\\-intensive applications but also ensures their peak performance and unwavering reliability.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Architect, refine, and escalate the capabilities of complex backend systems using Python, with a laser focus on efficiency, durability, and scale.
* Elevate application performance, optimizing for speed, scalability, and resource allocation.
* Forge robust methodologies to manage high concurrency and vast data volumes, setting new industry benchmarks.
* Collaborate intimately with engineering and product peers to crystallize requirements into resilient, scalable architectures.
* Demonstrate proficiency with advanced storage solutions and databases like Redis, PostgreSQL, and ClickHouse, enhancing system integrity.
* Champion coding excellence, testing rigor, and deployment precision, driving best practices across the development lifecycle.



  





**Requirements:** 



* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Minimum of 5 years of experience in backend development with Python in a production environment.
* Proven experience in scaling compute and I/O\\-intensive applications.
* Strong foundation in computer science, with a deep understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design principles.
* Experience in handling concurrent requests at scale and optimizing large\\-scale systems for performance and reliability.
* Familiarity with database technologies such as Redis, PostgreSQL, and ClickHouse.
* Experience in the financial sector, particularly in developing fintech applications or systems, is a plus.
* Solid understanding of software development life cycle, continuous integration, and continuous delivery (CI/CD) practices.
* Excellent problem\\-solving abilities and strong communication skills.

title: Software Engineer 2
description:
**Join the Team Modernizing Medicine**
 At
 **ModMed** 
 , we‚Äôre not just building software‚Äîwe‚Äôre reimagining the healthcare experience. Founded in 2010 by a practicing physician and a successful tech entrepreneur, we took a radically different approach:
 **we hired doctors and taught them how to code.** 
 This "for doctors, by doctors" philosophy has allowed us to create an AI\\-enabled, specialty\\-specific cloud platform that places patients at the center of care.
   

  

**A Culture of Excellence**
 When You Join ModMed, You‚Äôre Joining An Award\\-winning Team Recognized For Innovation And Employee Satisfaction. From Our Global Headquarters In Boca Raton Florida, And Extensive Employee Base In Hyderabad India, We Are a Team Of 4,500\\+ Passionate Problem\\-solvers On a Mission To Increase Medical Practice Success And Improve Patient Outcomes
   

  

* Consistently ranked as a Top Place to Work
* 2025 Globee Business Awards: Gold Globee for ‚ÄúTechnology Team of the Year‚Äù
* 2025 Black Book Awards: Ranked \\#1 EHR in 11 Specialties
* Florida Venture Forum: Venture\\-Backed Company of the Year


 We are growing fast, thinking big, and we are just getting started.
   

  

**Ready to modernize medicine with us?**
**Job Description Summary**
 Job Description:
   

  

* Java (Spring Boot) ‚Äì Strong proficiency in developing scalable backend applications.
* Maven ‚Äì Experience with dependency management and build automation.
* REST API Development ‚Äì Proven ability to design, develop, and maintain RESTful APIs.
* Angular/React ‚Äì Front\\-end development experience using one of these frameworks.
* SQL Databases ‚Äì Strong understanding of relational database design and optimization.


 Cloud \\& Infrastructure
   

  

**AWS Services ‚Äì Hands\\-on Experience With**
* EC2 (deployment and instance management)
* ElastiCache (caching strategies and performance optimization)
* DocumentDB (NoSQL data management)
* IAM (security, roles, and permissions)
* EKS (Kubernetes)


 Architecture \\& Deployment
   

  

* Experience deploying microservices and monolithic applications on AWS.
* Familiarity with best practices for scalability, resilience, and cost optimization.


 Nice to Have
   

  

* Experience with Databricks for data engineering or analytics workflows.
* Exposure to Business Intelligence tools such as Qlik, Tableau, or Power BI.


***ModMed Benefits Highlight:***
 At ModMed, we believe it‚Äôs important to offer a competitive benefits package designed to meet the diverse needs of our growing workforce. Eligible Modernizers can enroll in a wide range of benefits:
   

  

* Meals \\& Snacks: Enjoy complimentary office lunches \\& dinners on select days and healthy snacks delivered to your desk,
* Insurance Coverage: Comprehensive health, accidental, and life insurance plans, including coverage for family members, all at no cost to employees,
* Allowances: Annual wellness allowance to support your well\\-being and productivity,
* Earned, casual, and sick leaves to maintain a healthy work\\-life balance,
* Bereavement leave for difficult times and extended medical leave options,
* Paid parental leaves, including maternity, paternity, adoption, surrogacy, and abortion leave,
* Celebration leave to make your special day even more memorable, and company\\-paid holidays to recharge and unwind.


**PHISHING SCAM WARNING:** 
 ModMed is among several companies recently made aware of a phishing scam involving imposters posing as hiring managers recruiting via email, text and social media. The imposters are creating misleading email accounts, conducting remote "interviews," and making fake job offers in order to collect personal and financial information from unsuspecting individuals. Please be aware that no job offers will be made from ModMed without a formal interview process, and valid communications from our hiring team will come from our employees with a ModMed email address (first.lastname@modmed.com). Please check senders‚Äô email addresses carefully. Additionally, ModMed will not ask you to purchase equipment or supplies as part of your onboarding process. If you are receiving communications as described above, please report them to the FTC website.

title: SoC Director
description:
SoC Director
 



**Hyderabad** 




**Founded by highly respected Silicon Valley veterans \\- with its design centers established in Santa Clara, California. / Hyderabad/ Bangalore** 




  





**Our pay comprehensively beats "ALL" Semiconductor product players in the Indian market** 



- 


 SoC Director
 



 Job Description:
 



 SoC Chip Lead / Manager defines SoC architecture \\& solutions enabling the next generation SoC product for company's Server based product line. In this role you will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including hardware, software, verification, physical design engineers, to define and implement SoC architectures that meet the product requirements. We are seeking highly experience individuals who have a passion for innovation and are excited about the opportunity to create products from scratch. The key responsibilities for this role include, but are not limited to:
 







 Key Responsibilities:
 



 Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define and architect SoCs for HPC platform
 



 Conduct feasibility studies and performance analysis to determine optimal SoC architectures, subsystems, and interfaces.
 



 Develop and review specifications, microarchitecture, and system\\-level design documentation for SoCs.
 



 Writing SoC level constraints for implementation flow
 



 Lead a team of SoC engineers for successful tapeout and bringup
 



 Work closely with Architects, DV, DFT, PD, SW teams to ensure successful integration and functionality of the SoCs.
 



 Drive innovation by exploring new technologies, methodologies, and industry trends relevant to SoC design.
 



 Optimize SoC designs for power, performance, area, and other key metrics.
 



 Collaborate with customers and partners to understand their requirements and provide SoC solutions that meet their needs.
 



 Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior members of the team.
 











 Qualifications:
 



 B. Tech / M. Tech in ECE or CS or equivalent degree from premier institutes with 12\\+ years of experience
 



 Proven experience in SoC architecture and design using PCIe/CXL, D2D/UCIe, NVMe, DDR5, LPDDR5X
 



 Expertise in one or more application domains, such as Cache Controllers, NoC
 



 In depth understanding of modeling, workloads, SoC benchmarks and PPA tradeoffs
 



 Hands on experience with Verilog/SystemVerilog for design
 



 Strong understanding of hardware and software interactions in SoCs.
 



  










  





**Contact: Uday** 




**Mulya Technologies** 




**Email: muday\\_bhaskar@yahoo.com**

title: Senior Flutter Web Developer(Remote)
description:
**The Role**




 We are building a sophisticated product using Flutter targeting the Web. We are looking for a Lead Engineer to own the frontend architecture. Because this is a rich web application (not a public content site), our priority is runtime performance, complex state management, and pixel\\-perfect rendering, rather than SEO or offline capabilities.
 



  





**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Experience:** 
 4\\+ Years
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-time
 



**Salary:** 
 Competitve Salary based on experience
 



  





**What You Will Do** 




  




1. Architectural Ownership: Design and maintain a scalable frontend architecture. You will make high\\-level decisions on folder structure, state management, and modularization.
2. Web\\-Specific Optimization: Optimize the application for the browser environment using CanvasKit. You will be responsible for memory management, minimizing jank, and ensuring smooth 60fps scrolling in a browser context.
3. Desktop\\-Class UX: Build complex, dense UI components (data grids, dashboards, interactive tools) that feel like native desktop software but run in a browser.
4. Browser Integration: Handle JS Interop for specific browser functionalities (e.g., file handling, clipboard access, or third\\-party JS SDKs).
5. Lead \\& Mentor: Review code, set coding standards, and guide other developers in Flutter Web best practices.



  





**Must\\-Have Skills** 




  




* Flutter \\& Dart Mastery: 4\\+ years in software development, with significant recent experience shipping Flutter apps (specifically on Web).
* Deep Understanding of Rendering: You know when to use the CanvasKit renderer for maximum fidelity and performance. You understand the browser render loop.
* Complex State Management: Expert\\-level knowledge of managing app\\-wide state (using Riverpod, Bloc, etc.) in a large\\-scale application.
* Layout Expertise: Ability to build adaptive layouts that utilize the full real estate of a desktop browser window.
* JS Interop: Comfortable writing bindings between Dart and JavaScript when native browser features are needed " the core compotnets and change the requirememts"

title: Senior Engineer SDR (Software Defined Radio)
description:
**About Satlabs** 




 Satlabs Space Systems is developing advanced satellite communication systems, focusing on innovative data relay payloads for next\\-generation space applications. We are building a team of passionate engineers committed to advancing space technology through practical, efficient solutions.
 



  





**Position Overview** 




 We are seeking a dedicated senior SDR (Software Defined Radio) Engineer to join our payload development team. You will work under the mentorship of our Lead Communications Engineer (8\\+ years of experience) to design, develop, and validate SDR\\-based communication systems for our data relay satellite payload. This role is ideal for an engineer with solid foundational knowledge who is ready to take on meaningful technical challenges in the space sector.
 



  





 This is a hands\\-on position where you will translate high\\-level system requirements into working SDR implementations, collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, and contribute to mission\\-critical payload software and firmware development.
 



  





 Salary: 25\\-40 Lakhs per annum
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* SDR Development \\& Implementation: Design and implement Software Defined Radio applications using SDR Hardware and GNU Radio frameworks for satellite communication systems
* Firmware \\& Software Development: Develop and test host interface software and firmware for SDR hardware, working primarily in C/C\\+\\+ and Python in Linux environments
* Signal Processing: Implement and validate digital signal processing (DSP) algorithms for modulation, demodulation, filtering, and signal detection
* Hardware Integration: Collaborate with hardware engineers to integrate SDR components into the satellite payload, including FPGA configuration and testing
* Testing \\& Validation: Design and execute comprehensive testing protocols including unit testing, integration testing, and system\\-level validation in both simulated and real\\-world environments
* Protocol Development: Implement communication protocols specific to satellite data relay operations, ensuring compatibility with ground station systems
* Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, including interface control documents (ICDs), test procedures, and design rationale
* Troubleshooting: Debug hardware and software issues, performing root cause analysis and implementing solutions within tight development timelines



  





**Required Qualifications** 




 Education: Bachelor's degree in electrical engineering, Computer Engineering, Telecommunications, or equivalent field (or 3\\+ years of documented professional experience in related work)
 



  





 Experience: 3\\-5 years
 



  





**Must have Technical Skills** 



* Hands\\-on experience with Software Defined Radio (SDR) development and deployment
* Proficiency with GNU Radio for signal processing pipeline development and testing
* Demonstrated experience working with LimeSDR, USRP, HackRF, or similar SDR platforms
* Strong programming skills in C/C\\+\\+ for embedded systems and signal processing applications
* Proficiency in Python for SDR application development, testing scripts, and prototyping
* Experience with embedded Linux systems and comfortable working in command\\-line environments
* Understanding of RF fundamentals including signal propagation, antenna theory, and modulation techniques (FSK, PSK, QAM, OFDM, etc.)
* Familiarity with digital signal processing (DSP) concepts and implementation
* Familiarity with Git/GitHub for version control and collaborative development
* Experience with test equipment: spectrum analyzers, oscilloscopes, software\\-defined test benches
* Understanding of communication theory and wireless protocols (GSM, LTE, 5G, or proprietary protocols)



  





**Nice to have Technical Skills** 



* Knowledge of SoapySDR or similar abstraction layers for SDR hardware access
* Prior experience with satellite communications or space systems (even if limited)
* Experience with FPGA development and hardware\\-software co\\-design (Verilog, VHDL, or similar)



  





**Professional Competencies** 



* Strong problem\\-solving abilities with attention to technical detail
* Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies and frameworks
* Excellent communication skills to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams and document technical findings
* Self\\-motivated and capable of working independently on assigned tasks
* Experience working in fast\\-paced startup or research environments
* Comfortable with iterative development and incremental testing approaches



  





**What We're Looking For** 




 Beyond technical qualifications, we seek an engineer who:
 


* Takes ownership: You understand requirements and drive them to implementation without constant supervision, while knowing when to escalate or seek guidance
* Learns continuously: You stay updated with ecosystem developments and are willing to master new tools and frameworks
* Communicates clearly: You can explain complex technical concepts to both specialists and non\\-specialists, and document your work thoroughly
* Collaborates effectively: You work well in small, agile teams and thrive with regular feedback from experienced mentors
* Maintains quality: You write clean, maintainable code and take pride in rigorous testing and validation
* Thinks systematically: You approach problems methodically, considering trade\\-offs between performance, power consumption, cost, and reliability



  





**What You'll Gain** 



* Mentorship: Direct guidance from a Senior Communications Engineer with 8\\+ years of industry experience
* Real\\-world impact: Contribute to satellite systems that will operate in orbit and serve actual communication missions
* Technical growth: Deep expertise in SDR development, signal processing, and space systems within 2\\-3 years
* Diverse skill development: Exposure to hardware design, firmware development, RF engineering, and satellite operations
* Career acceleration: Proven track record in space technology opens doors to senior technical roles in the thriving space sector
* Collaborative culture: Work in a lean, mission\\-focused team where your contributions are directly visible



  





**Working Environment** 



* Primarily on\\-site
* Location: Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India (based at Satlabs facilities in IITM Research Park)



  





 Equipment: Access to development tools including RF test equipment, Linux workstations, and SDR hardware for prototyping
 



  





 Timeline: Project\\-driven with regular milestones and deliverables; expected to scale work impact as you grow in the role
 



  





**Application \\& Evaluation Process** 




 We review applications on a rolling basis. Please include:
 



  




* Resume/CV: Highlighting relevant SDR, embedded systems, and signal processing experience
* Portfolio/GitHub Profile (optional but encouraged): Links to open\\-source SDR projects, personal portfolios, or published work demonstrating hands\\-on SDR or signal processing experience



  





 Technical Questions: We may ask about your experience with specific tools (GNU Radio, SDR, Linux), programming projects, or technical problem\\-solving approaches
 



  





**Why Join Satlabs?** 




 The space sector is experiencing unprecedented growth, with satellite communications becoming critical infrastructure for global connectivity, Earth observation, and disaster management. Satlabs is at the forefront of innovative communication payload development, tackling real engineering challenges that matter at scale. As a team member, you'll not only develop world\\-class technology but also establish yourself as a recognized expert in space communications.

**Requirements:**

**Interview Process:**

**How to apply for this opportunity?**

**About Uplers:**

 (Note: There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).
   

  

 So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!
